channel.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
channel.description: I've seen it make Sheriff results say NS when they were actually Unseen, but that's obvious. How would it work on Observer Follow?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I think flirt shows killer/offensive. Personally I would make it move so K/O -> S/I -> S/S -> K/O

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Also, what happens with Mind Warp on Princess? I’m guessing Will-O-Wisp would also show nothing but what about Flirt?

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Plus there is the fact that most healers visit the king N1. This means an Obs can get lots of info by following king N1 and seeing who the healers and knights are.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NightX:

It’s still essentially random.

Not at all. For example in the tornement they have a meta set up where the prince always jails an even number and the invests check odd N1

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It’s still essentially random. The class they’re assigned, their target (if Scorned or Mercenary) is randomly generated. While targets may not be completely random, it is mostly a guess, and I think that’s pretty close to RNG. I might talk d1 regardless of what class I am.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
actually i changed my mind i guess observer follow results with mind warp are fine as is

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NightX:

We can’t stop early game RNG

Player action does not count as RNG. They can have basis for their actions even if it is subconscious or meta. Especially if someone talks D1

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Shrimpy:

I’m okay with this type of RNG

How is this RNG any different from any other kind of RNG? Any RNG past game settup should be avoided at all costs. It’s why I like bus crashing systems (where 2 drunks or 2 cw’s choosing the same target both fail)

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
More RNG is generally bad since it means less skill is involved. We can’t stop early game RNG, but we definitely shouldn’t add more for no reason.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I love that class actually haha it would be so much fun

Because RNG should be ruthlessly eliminated

I’m okay with this type of RNG

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
The “I hear you like RNG part” was sarcastic. I was trying to make a class that would trigger everyone who hates RNG as much as possible

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I didn’t say I like RNG

I just said it is impossible to remove.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
I hear you like RNG

New Neutral Killer Idea: The Gambler

Passive: Addiction: The Gambler’s addiction to gambling makes him immune to occupation and death.

Passive 2: Wheel of Fortune: When the gambler is executed for treason, a random player who voted execute will die.

Day Ability: Roll the Bones [unlimited]: Roll a 6 sided die. The result of this roll will affect your night abilities. If the gambler uses this ability, he MUST use an ability at night or he will lose a charge of Fate’s Hand.

Night Ability 1 Deal The Daggers [unlimited]: Target a player tonight and attack them. If you used Roll the Bones, an additional effect occurs. ( 1 = You (the gambler) slip and cut yourself on one of your knives! You start bleeding. 2 - You temporarily lose occupy immunity during this attack. 3 / 4 / 5 - Standard. No extra effect. 6 - Your attack will bypass night immunity. )

Night Ability 2: Fate’s Hand [2 uses]: Target a number of players equal to half of your dice result and kill them. (rounded down. Rolling a 1 = no kills. Rolling 2 or 3 = 1 kill. Rolling a 4 or 5 = 2 kills. 6 = 3 Kills.)

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Yes, it is impossible to eliminate RNG.

It will still be there if we eliminate every RNG ability.

but the only way we can do is that we can reduce the RNG.

That is the best possible method we have.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Start-of-game RNG is the only legal RNG tbh

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?

item.title: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
RNG is impossible to truly eliminate. Who gets attacked n1 is basically random. I do agree we should try to reduce it, but with a game like this, it is impossible.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Mind Warp work on Observer results?
